name: The Wild Fig Restaurant + Lounge
address: 405 North Rd, Coquitlam, BC V3K 3V9, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy wings tossed in your choice of flavor - Salt & Pepper, Fiery Hot, Honey Garlic or Teriyaki. Served with garlic ranch, carrot and celery crudites.

hasMenuItem.name: The Wild Fig Triple Cheese Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Alberta prime rib burger, topped with three cheese ''cheddar, havarti & brie'', smoky bacon, lettuce, tomato, onion rings, dill cucumber and fig relish. Served on a toasted brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Seafood Chowder
hasMenuItem.description: New England style, rich and creamy soup with clams, cod, bacon, cream

hasMenuItem.name: Rigatoni Alfredo, Lemon Herb Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Rigatoni pasta tossed with a creamy white wine * parmesan sauce, baby spinach, mushrooms and topped with lemon herb chicken. Served with garlic toast. (Vegetarian option | Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.name: Cancun Tacos - Fish | Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Three soft tortillas, chipotle mayo, Asian slaw, pickled veggies, salsa fresca and sour cream. (Vegetarian option)

hasMenuItem.name: Wild Fig Chocolate Decadence
hasMenuItem.description: Rich & sinful. Served warm with ice cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Lamb Osso Bucco
hasMenuItem.description: Lamb shanks braised in wine and tomato broth, creamy mashed potato, orange parsley gremolata. (Gluten free)

hasMenuItem.name: Blackened Cajun Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Warm potato salad, crispy bacon, creamy coleslaw and garlic butter. (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.name: Prawn Linguine
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh prawns and smoked bacon tossed in a basil scented rose sauce, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil, parmigiano reggiano shavings. Served with garlic toast. (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.name: Tandoori Chicken Club House
hasMenuItem.description: Tandoori marinated grilled chicken, garlic naan bread, Swiss cheese, bacon, butter lettuce, tomato

hasMenuItem.name: Korean Fried Cauliflower
hasMenuItem.description: (Vegetarian | Vegan Option) Cauliflower, gochujang sauce, sesame seeds, green onion, ranch.

hasMenuItem.name: The Wild Fig Calamari
hasMenuItem.description: Lemon marinated & breaded calamari topped with diced tomato, cucumber & red onions. Served with tzatziki & lemon wedge.

hasMenuItem.description: Smoked salmon avocado, cream cheese, scallions, lemon mayo, salmon pearls, soy glaze (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt tandoori and creamy tomato curry sauce, cooked in traditional east-Indian style. Served with basmati rice, naan bread. (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.description: Mussels steamed in garlic butter and white wine. Served with flavourful broth, garlic bread & fries. (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.description: Thai basil, bamboo shoot, red pepper, zucchini, coconut milk, curry paste, steamed jasmine rice. (Gluten free)

hasMenuItem.name: Mirin Glazed Sablefish
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet mirin glazed sablefish on a bed of fragrant sushi rice. Sliced avocado. Bok Choy garnished with green onions. Substitute with Salmon.

hasMenuItem.name: Blackened Cajun Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Warm potato salad, crispy bacon, creamy coleslaw and garlic butter. (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.name: 16 Oz. Fully Loaded Rib Eye
hasMenuItem.description: Certified Angus beef rib ee steak with light natural veal demi glaze. Topped with onion ring, served with seasonal vegetables and choice of fries or mash potatoes. (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.name: Steak & Lobster
hasMenuItem.description: Certified Angus beef strip loin and broiled lobster tail, fingerling potatoes, seasonal vegetables, portobellos, served with lemon herb butter and cognac mushroom sauce. (Gluten free option)

hasMenuItem.name: Shoestring Fries, Sea Salt, Crushed Pepper
hasMenuItem.description: Thinly cut fries seasoned with sea salt and crushed pepper, fried until crispy.

hasMenuItem.name: Onion Rings, Chipotle Aioli
hasMenuItem.description: Onion slices, battered and fried, served with a spicy and smoky chipotle aioli.

hasMenuItem.name: Mashed Potatoes, Golden Garlic
hasMenuItem.description: Mashed potatoes blended with roasted golden garlic, typically includes butter and cream for a smooth texture.

hasMenuItem.description: Crispy sweet potato fries served with a side of smoky and slightly spicy chipotle aioli.
